nodes.text: Warchief Naloriss was a male Wookiee living in Kerritamba Village in the Kkowir Forest on the planet of Kashyyyk. During the Galactic Civil War in 1.5 ABY, Dahlia Damask, leader of the Outcasts of Kkowir Forest, ordered a spacer exiled from Kerritamba Village to kill Naloriss. She ordered this as an act of revenge and strategic weakening of the village's defenses. The spacer infiltrated the village and slew the Wookiee. Dahlia rewarded the spacer with 5,000 credits.

Naloriss appears as a non-playable character in the Star Wars Galaxies expansion pack, Rage of the Wookiees, released in 2005. While the player may side with Kerritamba Village and never receive the quest to killed Naloriss from Dhalia Damask, he can still be attacked and killed.
